bill.title: Resources.
bill.description: An act to amend Sections 25173.6, 25187, 25214.3, and 25215.7 of, and to add Sections 44272.3, 44272.4, and 44272.7 to, the Health and Safety Code, to amend Sections 4137, 4142, 14560, 14581, 25421, 25449.4, 25461, 25806, and 48004 of, to amend, repeal, and add Section 71305 of, to add Sections 4124, 5016.2, 14556, and 25464 to, and to add and repeal Section 3402.3 of, the Public Resources Code, to add Sections 13628.5 and 85214 to the Water Code, and to amend Section 1 of Chapter 384 of the Statutes of 2009, relating to resources, making an appropriation therefor, and declaring the urgency thereof, to take effect immediately.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From print. May be acted upon on or after February 11.
Withdrawn from committee. Placed on second reading file.
Read second time. To third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 24. Noes 5. Page 3268.) To Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
Placed on second reading file. Read second time. To third reading.
Read third time. Amended. (Page 7114.) To third reading. Read third time. Urgency clause adopted. Passed. (Ayes 54. Noes 21. Page 7153.) To Senate.
In Senate. Urgency clause adopted. Senate concurs in Assembly amendments. (Ayes 27. Noes 4. Page 5244.) To enrollment.
Enrolled. To Governor at 11:45 a.m. (Enrolled measure version corrected October 12.)
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Chapter 718, Statutes of 2010.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB855 Committee on B. & F.R. (Ducheny)
